html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-02162019-03-25,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActExcise Act, 2001
Excise Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations in Respect of the Taxation of Cannabis Products
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS IN RESPECT OF THE TAXATION OF CANNABIS PRODUCTS in order to (1) make certain modifications to the excise duty framework for cannabis products; and (2) formalize and give legal effect to the decision of the Government of Ontario to exclude off-reserve purchases of cannabis for non-medical purposes from the Ontario Credit.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0077 Publication Date: 2019-04-03
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending Certain Regulations in Respect of the Taxation of Cannabis Products
precis: Regulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS IN RESPECT OF THE TAXATION OF CANNABIS PRODUCTS in order to (1) make certain modifications to the excise duty framework for cannabis products; and (2) formalize and give legal effect to the decision of the Government of Ontario to exclude off-reserve purchases of cannabis for non-medical purposes from the Ontario Credit.
